entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] HybridWebView.SetInvokeJavaScriptTarget() Multi-target support OR Generator to produce target #27990

Closed

  • Observe that no name is given for dark/light theme: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #27760
    .NET 9 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • add DebuggerTypeProxy for Shell #27989
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 #27988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [Testing] Enable the Issue417 test on iOS and Catalyst #27987
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-navigation, area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27986
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [Testing] Enabling ContextMenu UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #27405
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
